00043 // ---------- Telnet Support -------
00044 typedef enum {TEL_FILE_NAME = 0x01,
00045               TEL_PING_NODE,
00046               TEL_CHANNEL,
00047               TEL_REQUEST_DATA_FROM_NODE,
00048               TEL_REPORT_INTERVAL,
00049               TEL_CAL_WHICH_NODE,
00050               TEL_CAL_POINT_1,
00051               TEL_CAL_POINT_2,
00052               TEL_NAME_WHICH_NODE,
00053               TEL_NEW_NODE_NAME,
00054               TEL_WAKE_NODE,
00055               TEL_NEW_IP,
00056               TEL_TOUCH,
00057               TEL_TOUCH_INTERVAL
00058 } __attribute__((packed)) telType_t;
00059 
00060 extern u16 ping_address;
00061 extern telType_t telState;

00063 #define LF  0x0A
00064 #define CR  0x0D

00066 // Turn on and off reading print out.

00069 // ---------- TCP Support ----------
00070 #define TCP_PORT 6464
00071 volatile USOCKET host_socket;
00072 volatile USOCKET host_socket2;
00073 
00074 #define TCP_BUFFER_LENGTH 10
00075 typedef struct stTCP_MESSAGE
00076 {
00077     TCP_HEADER      tTCP_Header;     // reserve header space
00078     unsigned char   ucTCP_Message[TCP_BUFFER_LENGTH];
00079 } TCP_MESSAGE;

00084 extern u8 files_sys_active;

00086 #define MAX_STORED_READINGS      (1)
00087 typedef struct{
00088     u16   addr;          
00089     u8    c1;
00090     char  reading[7];    
00091     u8    c2;
00092     char  units[6];      
00093     u8    c3;
00094     char  name[9];
00095     u8    c4;
00096     char  time[30];
00097     u8    c5;
00098 } __attribute__((packed)) stored_readings_t;
